definition: to compete/competition/match/to surpass/better than/superior to/to excel
car/vehicle/CL:輛|辆[liang4]/machine/to shape with a lathe/Kangxi radical 159
hand/(formal) to hold/person engaged in certain types of work/person skilled in certain types of work/personal(ly)/convenient/classifier for skill/CL:雙|双[shuang1],隻|只[zhi1]

sentences.english: I did a double-take when I saw her dressed in biker 's gear.
sentences.chinese: 看见她一身赛车手打扮，我一时没反应过来。

sentences.english: He is a professional racecar driver and author.
sentences.chinese: 韩寒既是一名职业赛车手也是一位职业作家。

sentences.english: A racecar driver's occupation is full of danger.
sentences.chinese: 赛车手的工作非常危险。

sentences.english: Mr. Deluca, you ve been a racing-driver for nearly 10 years.
sentences.chinese: 迪卢卡先生，你已经当了10年赛车手了。

sentences.english: I believe Speed Racer knew that Racer X was really his brother.
sentences.chinese: 我相信高速赛车手知道赛车是他的亲兄弟。

sentences.english: Most rally drivers use a full complement Xenon lights.
sentences.chinese: 大部分的赛车手使用的都是全套的氙气灯系统。

sentences.english: He is a professional race car driver and author.
sentences.chinese: 韩寒既是一名职业赛车手也是一位职业作家。

sentences.english: The best drivers can do the quarter-mile in around 4 seconds.
sentences.chinese: 最好的赛车手可以在四秒左右开出四分之一英里。

sentences.english: Jimmy Lin is a famous singer and professional race driver in China.
sentences.chinese: 林志颖是中国的著名歌手和专业赛车手。

sentences.english: Han, a professional racing driver and public figure with legions of fans, has ordered a total media blackout at his magazine and apparently has a new policy when it comes to his private life.
sentences.chinese: 作为职业赛车手和一位粉丝众多的公众人物。

definition: Michael Schumacher (1969-), former German racing driver
